comments:
Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200704261104

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Start Java Application to profile
2. Make "Detach from Agent"
3. Make "Attach to Agent"
Unexpected error will occur while attepmting to establish a connection with the JVMTI agent and NullPointerException will be thrown. I will attach a screenshot with the error message.

Created an attachment (id=65177)
screenshot with NullPointerException
